title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The weapon in question is a beautifully crafted battle axe, renowned for its striking design and formidable power. Featuring a handle adorned with intricate engravings, this axe boasts a dual-bladed head that glimmers with a deep blue hue, suggesting a mystical quality. Perfectly balanced, it allows for swift and decisive strikes in combat. The combination of its aesthetic appeal and lethal efficiency makes this weapon a prized possession among warriors. Legends say it possesses ancient enchantments that enhance its wielder's strength and agility, making it not only a tool for destruction but also a symbol of its owner's prowess on the battlefield.
